name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, a parent of a school at Bocai Meixihu Primary School in Yuelu District, Changsha City, reported on a social media platform that his child was beaten by a teacher in the classroom. After a five-hour craniotomy, the shattered skull and foreign objects were removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 4, Wuhan EMU Depot was issued a notice by the Wuhan Railway Public Security EMU Depot Police Station to rectify internal safety hazards within a time limit due to the presence of Tesla vehicles in and out of the unit.
The notice stated that according to the provisions of the Public Security Commission [2021] No. 38, foreign-owned (holding) intelligent interconnected locomotives are prohibited from entering confidential places. As a confidential unit, the EMU Depot should prohibit foreign-owned electric vehicles from entering and leaving.
The deadline for rectification is September 8

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, a serious murder occurred at Luoyang Institute of Technology. A man stabbed three people with a fruit knife and then committed suicide by jumping off a building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After comparison, some netizens found that the draft amendment to the "Public Security Administration Punishment Law" is not as simple as Article 34 "hurting national feelings". Many articles in the draft expand or delegate law enforcement powers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently, in the vote on whether to support the amendment of the "Public Security Administration Regulations" on Observer.com, supporters have an overwhelming advantage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some media revealed that Beijing Tongren Hospital, one of the top tertiary hospitals in China, was the first to cut salaries, with performance wages falling by 50% and night shift pay being halved and then compensated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Multiple-picture warning] [Political depression warning]
Recently, a question-and-answer picture was circulated online, asking "Can the United States make a film like Oppenheimer? Can China make good biopics of scientists like Deng Jiaxian and Yang Zhenning?" The answer listed scientists who were criticized during the Cultural Revolution.
This picture immediately triggered everyone's memories and resonance of the tragic experiences of their elders during the Cultural Revolution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/l0dqndpZoZ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: The incident occurred on the afternoon of September 4th

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 7, a media report said that several citizens in a park in Wuhan, Hubei, were taken photos in Hanfu and were driven away by security guards who mistook them for kimonos.
Interestingly, as the Communist Youth League issued a statement yesterday to distance itself from anti-Japanese patriotic behavior, a number of patriotic bloggers who sensed the direction of the wind said that this news was deliberately promoted and hyped by the Japanese side and its forces at a critical time point such as "918", thereby showing the exaggerated anti-Japanese behavior of the Chinese people and thus smearing China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, Xi Jinping, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, signed an order to issue the "Measures for the Implementation of the "Population and Family Planning Law of the People's Republic of China" by the Military. It advocates that military personnel marry and have children at the appropriate age, and that a couple can have three children. New parenting leave and care leave for parents of only children will be added.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of September 7, heavy rain in Shenzhen caused urban flooding

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of September 7, in Xingye Huating Community, Jinping District, Shantou City, Guangdong Province, a conflict between the property management and the owner occurred due to the follow-up issues of the unfinished house. The property management locked the owner in the basement for several hours. 
Then threatened the owner that the water supply to the community will be cut off tomorrow, and the elevator will be stopped on the 15th

content: On September 7, President Xi Jinping visited Shangzhi City, Heilongjiang Province to visit and comfort the people affected by the flood.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 7, the Weinan Public Security Traffic Police released a video dissuading an elderly man from using a tricycle to send his two granddaughters to school, and educating the two children to resolutely resist the car driven by their grandfather in the future, which was unsafe.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 6, in the Hengda Binjiang Zuo'an Community in Huanggang, Hubei, due to the unfinished housing, the community elevators were downgraded, the greening was reduced, and the indoor construction was shoddy. The owners went to the Petition Bureau and the Housing Administration Bureau to report the situation and encountered violent law enforcement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the morning of September 7, President Xi Jinping and his entourage went to Harbin Engineering University to inspect naval-related research institutes.
All equipment that could leave video data on the scene was confiscated, and even the cameras on campus were covered with white cloth
Undergraduate students were locked up in the teaching building early in the morning to prevent students from coming into contact with the convoy, and all buildings on both sides of the road were required to draw curtains.
